1.title: Darlyng & Co.
1.subtitle: The mission of Darlyng & Co. is to give parents one less thing to worry about when it comes to caring for their baby. We always have parents in mind in the design process and are proud to present products that are functional, toxin-free, sourced from high-quality materials, and aesthetically pleasing.

products.name: Kids Hair Care Kits
products.description: Try our kid-friendly haircare kits curated for your Darlyng to grow and maintain healthy hair.

products.name: Muslin Newborn Swaddle Blanket
products.description: These soft cuddly blankets can be used in a variety of ways like a car seat cover, nursing, playtime, tummy time, stroller rides, receiving blanket and more.

products.name: Teether Plush Sensory Toy- Glow in the dark
products.description: Yummy Buddy is designed to engage vision, auditory and fine motor skills from infant to toddler and beyond. Bright, contrasting patterns will fascinate baby as eyesight develops, and they can discover new sounds, colors, and textures before. There’s a multi-purpose clip designed for strollers or diaper bags so it can travel with you. Exploring role play fun at home and on the go. Yummy Buddy has crinkly ears, both chewable "glow" silicone hands, teething bib, multiple colors, and chimes when shaken, too! The perfect sensory chew toy.

1.title: Red Bay Coffee
1.subtitle: Red Bay Coffee is at the forefront of what we believe is the fourth wave of coffee—a firm commitment to ensure coffee production is not only high quality and sustainable, but a vehicle for diversity, inclusion, social and economic restoration, entrepreneurship, and environmental sustainability. We are foodies, artists, activists, community folk, and innovators who love, love, love what we do.

products.name: East Fourteenth
products.description: Tanzanian Dark Roast - Blackberry, Dark Chocolate, Date  East Fourteenth is an homage to a past heritage and a link to history in the making. It is the story of Oakland’s wide-reaching cultures and creeds.

products.name: Coffee Mug - Africa's Gift (Black)
products.description: "Coffee Africa's Gift to the World" Coffee Mug - beautiful, stylish, black-on-black design with Red Bay Coffee logo - 12 ounces

products.name: Unisex Sweatshirt - Black Coffee - Black
products.description: Crewneck Sweatshirt - black with black foil print; back Red Bay Coffee logo; 80/20 Poly-Cotton Blend. Locally sourced and screen printed in Oakland, CA.

products.name: Unisex African Bead Bracelets paired with Lava or Wood Beads

products.description: Hand wired Large Amethyst pendant necklace with 14K Antiqued GP chain and findings.

3.title: The Words of Martin Luther King Jr. Reverberate in a Tumultuous Time
3.subtitle: Dr. King’s speeches have particular resonance today amid a year of sickness and death, Black Lives Matter protests and the storming of the Capitol.

3.title: Toni Morrison - Biography
3.subtitle: Toni Morrison was a Nobel and Pulitzer Prize-winning American novelist. Among her best-known novels are "The Bluest Eye," "Song of Solomon," "Beloved," and "A Mercy."

4.title: When the first all-black professional basketball team dominated...back in the ’20s
4.subtitle: "They were literally pioneers and recognized that they were making a statement in front of the audiences."

4.title: How the Negro National League Was Formed | Field of Dreams...Deferred
4.subtitle: The Negro National League debuted 100 years ago with world-class players and legions of fans. Hear how founder Rube Foster formed the league in Part 1 of "Field of Dreams...Deferred," a four-part series from TBS.

5.title: Sports Can Battle Racism Workshop
5.subtitle: A workshop for coaches on how to ensure that sports is an inclusive environment for ALL athletes.
5.moreInfo: In this 90 minute workshop, coaches will have an interactive discussion on how to combat racial discrimination, champion moral courage and empower their programs to create positive change in their communities.

5.title: Uncivil Podcast
5.subtitle: Uncivil brings you stories that were left out of the official history of the Civil War, ransacks America's past, and takes on the history you grew up with. We bring you untold stories about resistance, covert operations, corruption, mutiny, counterfeiting, antebellum drones, and so much more.

6.title: Shop Thoughtful
6.subtitle: thoughtful is a nonprofit that seeks to promote black businesses and create a one-stop-shop for consumers who want to vote with their wallets. thoughtful does not take any commissions off of the businesses it promotes, it is purely a hub designed to uplift and support established Black-owned businesses online.

products.name: I am a Natural Cutie Book

7.title: Ban or Restrict Tear Gas
7.subtitle: The use of tear gas has been banned and is illegal in war. This same tear gas is used by the law enforcement, to control unarmed crowds protesting for the BLM movement. Tear gas is also used for border control and is thrown at innocent migrants who are unarmed and pose no sudden threat to anyone in the vicinity.

8.title: A.O. Hamer
8.subtitle:
Hey, I'm Aramis and I love color!

My acrylic paintings are inspired by divine femininity, music, higher consciousness, and the cosmos. Liberation is my life's work- to free myself from the chains that could hold me back mentally, physically, and spiritually. My paintbrush reminds me of the creative power I have within the canvas - and life. As I take this journey to freedom, I hope to inspire others along the way.

8.title: The New Jim Crow
8.subtitle: The New Jim Crow is a stunning account of the rebirth of a caste-like system in the United States, one that has resulted in millions of African Americans locked behind bars and then relegated to a permanent second-class status—denied the very rights supposedly won in the Civil Rights Movement.

9.title: Classify White Supremacist Groups as Domestic Terrorist Organizations
9.subtitle: Request a new legal requirement to register, classify, and subsequently surveil white supremacist organizations as domestic terrorist organizations. By classifying these groups as intimidating to the American population and dangerous to human life, the institutions responsible for protecting citizens against such groups will have the necessary information and resources to prevent further destruction carried out by these violent terrorist groups.

9.title: Microaggressions Are A Big Deal: How To Talk Them Out And When To Walk Away
9.subtitle: Microaggressions are defined as the everyday, subtle, intentional — and oftentimes unintentional — interactions or behaviors that communicate some sort of bias toward historically marginalized groups. Learn more in this podcast from NPR.

products.name: Chocolate Gift Box

products.description: Hooked of 100% wool pile, the Tigress Collection brings the wild to the home. Designed by Justina Blakeney by Loloi, the collection brings saturated colors and illustrative designs for a true conversation piece in any space.

15.title: Not all Black people are African American. Here's the difference.
15.subtitle: Black Lives Matter protests have opened up conversations about the history of privilege, racism, and the lived experiences and identities of black people in America. Now, the distinction between "Black" and "African American" has become a prominent conversation on social media.

16.title: Robert Tanner Freeman - Bytes of History
16.subtitle: Robert Tanner Freeman was born in Washington DC in 1846. He was the son of slaves who had bought their freedom in the 19th century. Historical records are unclear but they probably adopted the surname Freeman in response to their transition.

16.title: Knock Your Socks Off
16.subtitle: Created from an appreciation for high-quality socks that make a lasting impression and backed by years of retail buying experience, Knock Your Socks Off (aka KYSO) was founded in 2016 in Toronto, Canada.

products.name: Above the Clouds Women's Ankle Socks
products.description: Ultra soft fabric, made from a blend of 80% combed cotton. Fits just above the ankle. Fits Women's shoe size 6-11

products.name: Basketball Cotton Socks
products.description: Ultra soft fabric, made from a blend of 80% combed cotton. Fits mid-calf length. Fits US men shoe size 7-12

products.name: Cherry Dress Socks
products.description: Sweet, sweet cherries! Made from a blend of combed cotton, spandex and elastin. Fits men's shoe size 9-12 and women's shoe size 7-10

17.title: How easy (or hard) is it to confuse a gun for a Taser?
17.subtitle: Oscar Grant. Eric Harris. Daunte Wright. April 11, 2020 added another name to the list of Black men killed by police officers who intended to deploy a Taser but instead fired a handgun.

17.title: Double Dutch Dolls
17.subtitle: Through Fashion and Fun encourage young girls to explore and appreciate each other’s differences and similarities. Beauty comes in all shades and the brand seeks to create a community that celebrates the multicultural beauty of every child.

products.name: 18" African American Fashion Doll- Zaria Bradley
products.description: Hi! My name is Zaria Bradley. I am Kaila’s levelheaded, laidback twin-sister. My personal style is "classic cool". I’m into Soccer, Science, and keeping Kaila out of trouble, which is a huge job. I am in the 8th grade at Stylesboro Middle school. I am Captain of the Stingrays soccer team, President of the Science Club. I’ve got my future all planned out with a soccer scholarship, HBCU undergrad and med school.

products.name: 18" African American Fashion Doll- Kaila Bradley
products.description: Hi! My name is Kaila Bradley and I love fashion. I am the creative mind behind the Double Dutch Dolls hip style. A budding fashionista, I design all of our clothes and have plans to launch my own fashion line, named none other than "Double Dutch Dolls" in honor of me and my also fabulous sister, Zaria. I am in the 8th grade at Stylesboro Middle school and Co-captain of the Stingrays Cheerleading team.

products.name: Double Dutch Dolls Book 1- "Double Dare"
products.description: Navigating middle school can be tricky. But, 14-year old twins Kaila and Zaria Bradley, known to everyone as the Double Dutch Dolls, seem to have it all figured out.

18.title: Just Mercy: A Story of Justice and Redemption
18.subtitle: An unforgettable true story about the potential for mercy to redeem us, and a clarion call to end mass incarceration in America — from one of the most inspiring lawyers of our time.

18.title: Book: What Does It Mean to Be White?
18.subtitle: Developing White Racial Literacy - Revised Edition

products.name: Lip Balm
products.description: Organic Natural Lip Balm that is homemade and great for dry lips or any lips. The ingredients listed below were all included to keep your lips smooth, full, and healthy even after application!

19.subtitle: Revisionist History is a podcast from Malcolm Gladwell and Pushkin Industries.In this episode: A landmark Supreme Court case. A civil rights revolution. Why has everyone forgotten what happened next?

20.title: Sade Baron
20.subtitle: Sade and Rachel are a mother-daughter duo creating high-performance body care products that make your skin feel great. As a 100% woman-owned business, they select every ingredient in their products. Everything is handmade, carefully packaged, and personally checked for impeccable quality.

products.name: Body Care Set 1 - Normal Skin
products.description: The essentials kit features everything you need to keep maintain your skin health. Start with a new skinfood routine and feed it nutrient-rich superfoods all day, every day.

products.name: Go Clean Starter Kit | Body Care Set
products.description: With this Go Clean Body Care Starter Set you can finally remove excessive ingredients and chemicals from your daily body care routine. With Sade Baron, all of our products are 100% vegan, made with clean ingredients to work for most skin types, so you can trust that you'll find great products to work for you.

products.name: Fragrance Free Body Wash
products.description: A light face and body wash suitable for everyday use. This fragrance-free body wash is perfect for babies, children and adults with reactive and sensitive skin. With superfats galore like avocado oil, olive oil and more, this liquid castile soap will leave your skin hydrated day after day.

20.title: Dawoud Bey: The Birmingham Project
20.subtitle: In 2005 American photographer Dawoud Bey visited Birmingham, Alabama, to explore the possibility of making work that would commemorate the September 15, 1963, bombing of the 16th Street Baptist Church. The Birmingham Project, a series that includes photographic diptychs and a split-screen video, is Bey’s powerful response.

21.title: What If I Don't Move to the Back of the Bus?
21.subtitle: Rosa Parks brought together a unique blend of life experiences, a commitment to racial justice, and a flawless reputation to transform a single act of defiance into a defining moment for the modern American civil rights movement.

21.title: What Is Juneteenth?
21.subtitle: Juneteenth (short for “June Nineteenth”) marks the day when federal troops arrived in Galveston, Texas in 1865 to take control of the state and ensure that all enslaved people be freed. The troops’ arrival came a full two and a half years after the signing of the Emancipation Proclamation. Juneteenth honors the end to slavery in the United States and is considered the longest-running African American holiday.

22.title: The Pan-African Congresses, 1900-1945
22.subtitle: In the nearly half century between 1900 and 1945, various political leaders and intellectuals from Europe, North America, and Africa met six times to discuss colonial control of Africa and develop strategies for eventual African political liberation.

22.title: Automotive Heroes of Black History Month
22.subtitle: Ever wonder what driving would be like without turn signals or traffic lights? Well, without these great inventors, engineers, scientists, and pioneers of their field, driving wouldn’t be what it is today! In celebration of Black History Month, we want to share a few of their exciting stories with you.

23.title: Carter G. Woodson - African American Trailblazers in Virginia History
23.subtitle: Enjoy a six-minute podcast on the life of Carter G. Woodson who helped start the first Negro History Week.

23.title: The Get Real Movement
23.subtitle: Get REAL is a Canadian non-profit that combats LGBTQ+ discrimination and promotes acceptance in schools, summer camps, and workplaces. Our merchandise helps fund our work! Every order is shipped with a piece of feedback written by real students across Canada who have participated in one of our workshops

products.name: No Homophobia T-Shirt
products.description: This piece is a statement. It's a statement about what we believe, what we do, and who we are.

products.name: Love is Love Tank

products.name: Retro Pride 2018 Tank Top
products.description: This is a print collaboration with artist Emily Deechaleune.

products.name: Blue Curved Mask
products.description: Still want to look dapper while protecting yourself and others? We have the answer! Reusable and re-washable, these fabric masks will keep you looking good and doing good. When you buy a curved face mask from Ruth Nathan’s we donate a rectangular face mask to health care professionals and essential workers in need.

products.name: Franc Bleu Bow Tie
products.description: The deep older brother of the Franc Un pattern, the Franc Bleu’s watercolor pen lines convey elegance and a truly historic sense of style. Also inspired by French Polynesian currency, the Franc Bleu carries notes of art deco, dancing under the stars, and midnight.

products.description: Inspired by French Polynesian currency, the Franc Un pattern gives off a refined yet playful vibe sure to elevate your look during formal occasions. Perfect for when you want to be taken seriously—but not too seriously. Notes of Art Deco, French Quarter jazz, and pistachios.

24.title: Justice For Tony McDade
24.subtitle: Tony McDade was a transgender black man who got killed by police in Tallahassee. Sign this petition and encourage others to do so as well to get his name out there.

25.title: BLK & Proud Forever
25.subtitle: BLK & Proud Forever was started in 2019 for a family that was in need of some custom apparel that could display their Black pride. Our goal is to provide some great BLK&Proud gear that supports, celebrates and amplifies the dopeness in being Blackity Black Black 365.

25.title: How Negro History Week Became Black History Month and Why It Matters Now
25.subtitle: Black History Month has been celebrated in the United States for close to 100 years. But what is it, exactly, and how did it begin?

26.title: The Other Wes Moore
26.subtitle: Two kids named Wes Moore were born blocks apart within a year of each other. Both grew up fatherless in similar Baltimore neighborhoods and had difficult childhoods; both hung out on street corners with their crews; both ran into trouble with the police. How, then, did one grow up to be a Rhodes Scholar, decorated veteran, White House Fellow, and business leader, while the other ended up a convicted murderer serving a life sentence?

26.title: TGEU International Women’s Day - Inclusivity Media Statement
26.subtitle: On the occasion of the International Women’s Day (IWD) on 8 March, TGEU joins the voices of trans people around the world in denouncing oppression, violence, and hate against women and non-binary people in all spheres of life.

27.title: Sorella
27.subtitle: Sorella was founded by two Boss Babes, Heather Sanders & Brittney Turner in 2012. We were 20 years old with no fashion background or training but a lot of hustle and drive! 28.subtitle: Read the Equal Justice Initiative's report on racial violence after the Civil War, from 1865-1876.

29.title: Covid-19’s Impact on People in Prison
29.subtitle: People who are incarcerated are at great risk of sickness and death as a result of the Covid-19 pandemic and more must be done to release people who are imprisoned and are not a threat to public safety or are elderly or infirm.

29.title: Shoe Crazy Wine
29.subtitle: We work with the best vineyards in California to develop our unique blends. Our wines are created with women in mind. Owned and operated by a mother-daughter team, we understand that women face tough daily challenges. And we know we can tackle them together-with a great pair of shoes and a great wine!

products.name: Naked Strawberry Passion Sangria ( Non-Alcohol)
products.description: Our Hand Crafted , scintillating Sweet Sangria created from superior ingredients with tangy citrus notes and hints of strawberry pie. Pairs with chocolate, ham, bacon wrapped scallops and key lime pie. Enjoy “As Is” or add seltzer, Shoe Crazy's Sparkling Strawberry Rose wine, or your favorite spirits.

products.name: Sparkling Brut
products.description: Our Brut is exceptional. This demi-sec has a light golden color with aromas of green apple and nectarine with an eﬀervescence of bubbles. On the palate Note of honey crisp apples and pears. Great wine to be enjoyed year-round! Celebrate every occasion!

products.name: Sparkling Peach Mango
products.description: A beautiful orange hue that is accentuated by tiny bubbles. Inviting aromas of succulent peach & sweet mango entwine.

30.title: White Privilege: Unpacking the Invisible Knapsack
30.subtitle: As a white person, I realized I had been taught about racism as something that puts others at a disadvantage, but had been taught not to see one of its corollary aspects, white privilege, which puts me at an advantage.

30.title: Nia the Loc God
30.subtitle: A natural oil that your hair will love. You are one step closer to moisturized, shiny, healthy hair that smells amazing.

products.name: Loc God Stimulating Oil 4oz
products.description: This stimulating oils is the perfect item to add to your haircare routine. 100% natural, also smells 100% like lemongrass essential oils.  This product is extremely light and will leave your scalp itch free.

products.name: The Loc God Hydration Mist 9oz
products.description: This hydration mist is the perfect item to add to your haircare routine. 100% natural, also smells 100% like lavender essential oils.  This product will leave your hair super soft and give you an extra boost of hydration and shine.

products.name: The Loc God Scalp Renewal Cleansing Shampoo (Lemongrass)
products.description: Deep cleansing shampoo, with a luxurious smell that will leave your hair clean and not feeling stripped. This shampoo is 100% natural. It will help with dandruff, irritated and or itchy scalp.

31.title: Figgers Communication Inc.
31.subtitle: Figgers Communication is where the entire buzz on the internet and social media comes to rest in your pocket! We are a telecommunications company that provides Cellular, Mobile Broadband, Home phone and international calling services.

31.title: Amak By Amiya
31.subtitle:
Tween CEO and Entertainer Amiya Steed founded her business Amak by Amiya footwear in 2016 as a way of self-expression. Amak by Amiya is home to her exclusive sneakers and custom uniform footwear line for schools nationwide. 

Her store is also home to the 1st Period Kit which includes: all of the neccessities, positive affirmations, and girly surprises.

(Please note that all footwear is customized and can take 4-6 weeks for purchasers to receive. Please allow ample time for delivery.)
